Samurott (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0502: Dewott
Pokémon
#0504: Patrat →

Samurott has been featured on 9 different cards since it debuted in the Black & White expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Samurott cards are normally Water-type or Darkness-type Stage 2 Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Samurott

Samurott
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
